title: Bug 16751Renaming a class doesn't update all references
description: class SuperClass {public static final String CONSTANT = "value";}class SubClass extends SuperClass {}class Test {public static void main(String[] arguments) {System.out.println(SubClass.CONSTANT);}}Use Refactor/Rename Element... to rename SubClass.
OB: Bug 16751Renaming a class doesn't update all references The reference in Test is notupdated, causing a compile time error.
